content.en: Sports AI: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can improve various aspects of sports performance and analysis. They are using deep learning and neural network algorithms to recognize athletes, analyze human motion, detect objects, and recognize behavior in sports videos. These algorithms are being applied to different sports, such as basketball, football, and volleyball, and are being used in wearable devices and coaching systems.
content.da: Sports AI: Forskere undersøger, hvordan algoritmer kan forbedre forskellige aspekter af sportspræstation og -analyse. De bruger dyb læring og neurale netværksalgoritmer til at genkende atleter, analysere menneskelig bevægelse, opdage objekter og genkende adfærd i sportsvideoer. Disse algoritmer anvendes på forskellige sportsgrene såsom basketball, fodbold og volleyball og bruges i bærbare enheder og træningssystemer.
